rows.name: Professional Experience and Knowledge
cells: Having of 0-1 years of relevant experience. Basic proficiency of industry standard design/CG art tools.
Having at least 1-2 years of relevant experience. Developing or has developed proficiency and effectiveness of industry standard design/CG art tools and processes.

Having at least 3 years of relevant experience. Highly proficient and developing or has developed a comprehensive knowledge of industry standard design/game industry artistic tools and processes and having the ability to interface directly with clients to present design/art  work without the support of an Account Manager.

Having at least 5 years of relevant experience. Has proven depth and breadth of knowledge of industry standard design/game industry artistic tools and processes. Recognized as an authority in multiple function areas. Experience leading client presentations, workshops, and discussions. Experience estimating the efforts for various project types. Understanding of the latest trends in design/game industry.

Having at least 7 years of relevant design/CG art experience.  Recognized as a resource for innovation and groundbreaking design/CG art. Experience with industry thought leadership including writing, speaking and teaching; Understanding of the latest trends in design/game industry.

rows.name: Responsibility and Reliability
cells: Expected to work effectively under supervision and assists senior members of the team with design/CG art services to clients; Demonstrates attention to detail and adherence to company process.

Work as part of a team under some supervision to create deliverables; Translate business requirements and specifications into usable, useful and desirable deliverables. Participate in new-business activities, presentations and estimates. Present work to internal teams and clients under supervision. Demonstrates high standards of workmanship, attention to detail and adherence to company process and industry standards/best practices.

Independently create deliverables; Translate business requirements and specifications into usable, useful and desirable deliverables. Participate in new-business activities, presentations and estimates. Collaborate with design/CG art leadership on process; Present design/CG art work to internal team as well as clients without supervision. Ability to take direction and work effectively without supervision. Able to work with internal and external teams on multiple projects simultaneously, think and respond quickly to requests. Demonstrates high standards of workmanship, attention to detail and adherence to company process and industry standards/best practices.

Lead a team in the creation of deliverables; Lead design/CG art aspects of responsive-design projects; Serve as a Lead for new-business activities, presentations and estimates; Collaborate with creative leads on design/CG art process; Present design work to internal team as well as clients; Delegate work to more junior team members as needed/appropriate; Serve as thought leader in the field by writing, speaking and/or teaching.  Further the practice of design/CG art within; EPAM by sharing knowledge, updating the team on industry advances, and keeping abreast of latest trends. Deliver innovative strategic design/CG art solutions and develop client relationships.

 

Establish direction and vision which mobilizes the design/CG art team(s) to meet clearly defined goals and targets. Help to recruit, manage, support, groom, inspire, and lead design/CG art team to creative solutions that fulfill client objectives. Expected to be self-managing / work without supervision. Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously while maintaining absolute organization and prioritization under extreme pressure; Ability to think and respond quickly to client and internal team demands, while maintaining extraordinary attention to detail;  Responsible for design/CG art deliverables produced by more junior team members.

Serve as thought leader in the field by writing, speaking and/or teaching.  Further the practice of design/CG art within EPAM by sharing knowledge, updating the team on industry advances, and keeping abreast of latest trends. Be able to present and sell complex ideas and concepts to C-level stakeholders.

 

Establish direction and vision which mobilizes the design/CG art team(s) to meet clearly defined goals and targets. Help to recruit, manage, support, groom, inspire, and lead design team to creative solutions that fulfil client objectives.  Expected to be self-managing, take responsibility for a subsystem or a whole project, and work without supervision. Ability to independently lead a department of designers/artists. Responsible for the methodology creation/refinement/growth responsibilities for the design/CG art team to leverage.  Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously while maintaining absolute organization and prioritization under extreme pressure; Ability to think and respond quickly to client and internal team demands, while maintaining extraordinary attention to detail;

 

Must be a role model for colleagues, on a par with the best industry standards; creates deliverables in excellent quality.
